content:
365 Thomas Massie: "To avoid a repeat of last night’s shellacking in the 2026 midterms, Republicans should: quit covering for pedophiles; put America before Israel; put farmers before corporations; quit funding wars abroad; reduce spending to control inflation; quit attacking independent voices" posted 7 days ago by raptoris2 135 comments award share report block Thomas Massie @RepThomasMassie • 7d To avoid a repeat of last night’s shellacking in the 2026 midterms, Republicans should: quit covering for pedophiles put America before Israel put farmers before corporations quit funding wars abroad reduce spending to control inflation quit attacking independent voices
135 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save ChyNahAzzWhole1 37 points 7 days ago Stop being MIGA and start supporting MAGA. permalink award report block reply UCantStumpTheTrump 12 points 7 days ago It’s not even a shellacking, lmao. Dems won in blue states with no voter ID. Shocking! permalink parent award report block reply LostElf 25 points 7 days ago Shellacking. Jesus H. Did he expect Sliwa to be the next NYC mayor? Did the GOP lift a finger to help any Republicans in any of these races? All I saw was Scott Presler and X pundits. How about all Republicans unite to push President Trump's platform on overdrive so midterms feature secure elections and a shattered Democrat party with half their leaders behind bars. Then Massie's wishlist can be addressed with a vengeance. permalink award report block reply SanityGumby 12 points 7 days ago All of the Republican candidates had tds permalink parent award report block reply 1_Badcop 3 points 7 days ago Seriously? Nothing more. permalink award report block reply fr33d0mTruck 13 points 7 days ago define MAGA and why is he anti MAGA? I'm just curious...because if you're against any of the things listed here, wtf kinda drugs are on seriously? permalink parent award report block reply Badfinz_FL 10 points 7 days ago go read his tweets on X. permalink parent award report block reply SanityGumby 2 points 7 days ago Because he literally is and votes against anything good for the country because his financial backers like Muslim terrorists groups, ilhan omar, and the democrat socialists of America tell him to permalink parent award report block reply ReleasetheList 4 points 7 days ago https://thefreedomindex.org/report/scorecard-119-1/chamber/rep/ Is this a Muslim site? They don't weight up issues like him voting for unlimited funds for Biden with higher weight. permalink parent award report block reply SanityGumby 1 points 6 days ago It must be because he always votes with democrats so by effect it’s impossible for him to score 100% on any freedom scoring that’s real. permalink parent award report block reply Stlpoolguy 1 points 6 days ago The mf'er has voted on D dogshit in the past, and while the Trump budget isn't perfect, it's a step in the right direction. Something we haven't had in decades.... but here's your boy banging his drum like he has no record. I don't dislike the guy but if you aren't flexible in the least...you're gonna break. Blumpkin of Virginia would probably disagree with that. permalink parent award report block reply imnotdeadyet 2 points 7 days ago True, but a commie winning in NYC is a wakeup call that the Dems are fucking crazy. permalink parent award report block reply TakingCoatsWIN 7 points 7 days ago DeBlasio was a literal Communist party member.... Busy yapping while doing nothing. permalink award report block reply SanityGumby 6 points 7 days ago This faggot is funded by the same people that funded mamdami. permalink award report block reply 1_Badcop 5 points 7 days ago He's right. And none of those things will happen. permalink award report block reply mlp67 3 points 6 days ago Why didn't Massie ask for the Epstein files the whole 4 years Biden was president? He says good things but never votes with the President when he needs his vote. The muh principles bullshit. I’m so sick and damn tired of our useless government. MAGA Inc was started with $20 million from Trump's very own Save America PAC. permalink parent award report block reply TrancePhreak 2 points 6 days ago Sure, but that doesn't take away from Jeff Yass, a pro-Israel donor, funding him. permalink parent award report block reply sordfysh PRO 0 points 6 days ago Wow. So Jeff Yass is an anti-semite? He clearly funds anti-Zionism. permalink parent award report block reply TrancePhreak 1 points 6 days ago He funds messaging that drives up donations to Zionist PAC's. It's an old trick used by AIPAC and others. Has Massie actually voted for anything of the sort, or is it all just messaging? permalink parent award report block reply deleted 1 points 7 days ago DickTick PRO 2 points 7 days ago Our gas has been around 2.40 to 2.50 here for many months now and that's up in the middle of the city permalink parent award report block reply SanityGumby 2 points 7 days ago Found the idiot too retarded to understand his own problem that the rest of us don’t have permalink parent award report block reply Thereyago 1 points 7 days ago Massie is convincing me on term limits permalink award report block reply eclectic22 1 points 7 days ago The Asshole speaks. permalink award report block reply journalist 1 points 7 days ago Eat a dick Massie permalink award report block reply Obambi 1 points 7 days ago Fuck Israel. Fuck China. Fuck Iran. permalink award report block reply booblitchutz 1 points 6 days ago The GOP lost those races this week because the democrats poured billions into ads, door knockers, ballot harvesting, no kings rallies… they have all the cash they would ever need to outspend us, every single time - without exception. permalink award report block reply CrankyCrab 1 points 7 days ago Yawn... The uniparty peddling fake news in a failed attempt to undermine President Trump.  This clown does nothing but talk. People have short attention spans...let's see what happens in 2026. permalink award report block reply snoozeflu 1 points 7 days ago Should do this. Should do that.
Anyways. permalink award report block reply deleted 0 points 7 days ago anotherthing -1 points 7 days ago He voted with his party 13 times in September 2025 alone. You can look it up. Congressional record is public, and ignorance is a choice. https://massie.house.gov/voterecord/ Honoring the life and legacy of Charles "Charlie" James Kirk. GRID Power Act National Coal Council Reestablishment Act Promoting Cross-border Energy Infrastructure Act District of Columbia Policing Protection Act District of Columbia Judicial Nominations Reform Act Honoring Our Heroes Act of 2025 Territorial Response and Access to Veterans’ Essential Lifecare Act Stop Illegal Entry Act of 2025 Personnel Oversight and Shift Tracking Act of 2025 Shared Property Agency Collaboration and Engagement Act of 2025 Stop Chinese Fentanyl Act of 2025 FMS-Only List Review Act And this doesn't count consideration voting and other procedural votes, just the votes to pass things. permalink parent award report block reply asiandood 0 points 6 days ago Stop Illegal Entry Act of 2025 = defacto amnesty for illegals. Come on, everything you listed does nothing and some are already ILLEGAL, yet why do you need to pass something else?  Its already ILLEGAL. He voted against securing the border and building the wall TWICE. permalink parent award report block reply anotherthing 1 points 6 days ago He cosponsored a bill in 2023 to build a border wall, paying for it by cutting UN funds. He's on board with it when you cut spending from one thing in order to fund it. You guys don't seem to get how bad of a situation our debt is. Our debt is $38T. Our GDP is only $28T. Our spending is around $7T. Our revenue is around $5T. Our deficit is around $2T even with tariffs. The only reason our currency hasn't fallen off a cliff is because it's the defacto currency for trade. If the BRICS nations could actually trust one another, and it replaced the dollars, we'd be in a hyper-inflation death spiral. We currently spend as much on interest on that debt as we do on medicare. We spend 27% more on interest on the debt as we do Defense. Two years ago, interest on the debt was the same as Defense in terms of spending. That's only going up. And the GOP led Congress and Trump are pushing Biden Era spending levels. The GOP used to talk about balancing the budget and cutting spending. It's been years since they've done that. permalink parent award report block reply asiandood 0 points 6 days ago Everything he DOES is on purpose that he knows it will never pass so he can virtue signal as "principled". He doesn't care about spending.  Here's an amazing comment I found on a youtube post glazing Massie: THOMAS MASSIE delivered the DECIDING VOTE (7-6) to move the "Fiscal Responsibility Act of 2023" out of the House Rules Committee to allow it to come to a full vote in the House. The following day, the "Principled" Thomas Massie voted YES to pass this bill, which SUSPENDED the debt ceiling and allowed UNLIMITED BORROWING
until January 1, 2025. He alone had the power to kill that deal in Committee, if he truly cared, yet he passed on that opportunity. That's right. Massie essentially handed Biden a blank check and said "SPEND AWAY." Massie doesn't care about debt, he doesn't care about spending, and he is NOT "principled." https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/30/debt-ceiling-deal-updates.html Massie's social media in the past and receipts were posted here in the past that Massie did not want to be responsible for a govt shutdown under Biden. permalink parent award report block reply TrancePhreak 0 points 7 days ago Tell Massie to quit blocking Trump's agenda. permalink award report block reply Darkpoisonousshaddow 0 points 7 days ago Why do people hate this guy? I can't imagine anyone not agreeing with these points. permalink award report block reply Mhmm2MoreWeeks -1 points 7 days ago None of this is accurate. permalink award report block reply captflerbus -2 points 7 days ago none of these things are happening guy is a dope permalink award report block reply RyanKeyOh -2 points 7 days ago Eat a dick massie permalink award report block reply tingo999 -10 points 7 days ago What part of not allowing Muslims to dominate Israel is putting Israel before the USA? What is the USA doing in supporting Israel that is harming the USA? Israel is part of Christian history. This dumb fuck is telling us to remove the USA military dominance? Which would allow all of the other global militaries to dominate the world? This guy is a dumb fuck you're all dumb fucks. This is the end of the USA and the world. The USA needs to stay dominate, the USA needs to stop Muslims from dominating every country in the world. This is fucking retarded. permalink award report block reply CommanderOfCheese 9 points 7 days ago The physical land of Israel is where most of the Bible takes place, true. The present occupants, not so much. Their religion not the Father of Christianity; Christianity isn't a derivative branch of Judaism.
